column4: Does anyone is having unstable graphic interface with nvidia cards lately ?
have you found out what is happening?
Mine is doing worse~ I can't check the enable box to use compiz
Yeah, it happens to me sometimes
I have disabled compiz, otherwise I cant use the computer for more than one hour without having problems
You might have fried your card~
I think it might be some ubuntu update, or even the latest nvidia driver
I can run Battlefield 2 without any problem on cedega
